amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Corps of Engineers Expenses by $4 million and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce Corps of Engineers Expenses by $4 million and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 104 - 316 (Roll no. 373).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Gosar.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 104 - 316 (Roll no. 373).
